00061 #define  EPERM     1  /* Operation not permitted */
00062 #define  ENOENT     2  /* No such file or directory */
00063 #define  ESRCH     3  /* No such process */
00064 #define  EINTR     4  /* Interrupted system call */
00065 #define  EIO     5  /* I/O error */
00066 #define  ENXIO     6  /* No such device or address */
00067 #define  E2BIG     7  /* Arg list too long */
00068 #define  ENOEXEC     8  /* Exec format error */
00069 #define  EBADF     9  /* Bad file number */
00070 #define  ECHILD    10  /* No child processes */
00071 #define  EAGAIN    11  /* Try again */
00072 #define  ENOMEM    12  /* Out of memory */
00073 #define  EACCES    13  /* Permission denied */
00074 #define  EFAULT    14  /* Bad address */
00075 #define  ENOTBLK    15  /* Block device required */
00076 #define  EBUSY    16  /* Device or resource busy */
00077 #define  EEXIST    17  /* File exists */
00078 #define  EXDEV    18  /* Cross-device link */
00079 #define  ENODEV    19  /* No such device */
00080 #define  ENOTDIR    20  /* Not a directory */
00081 #define  EISDIR    21  /* Is a directory */
00082 #define  EINVAL    22  /* Invalid argument */
00083 #define  ENFILE    23  /* File table overflow */
00084 #define  EMFILE    24  /* Too many open files */
00085 #define  ENOTTY    25  /* Not a typewriter */
00086 #define  ETXTBSY    26  /* Text file busy */
00087 #define  EFBIG    27  /* File too large */
00088 #define  ENOSPC    28  /* No space left on device */
00089 #define  ESPIPE    29  /* Illegal seek */
00090 #define  EROFS    30  /* Read-only file system */
00091 #define  EMLINK    31  /* Too many links */
00092 #define  EPIPE    32  /* Broken pipe */
00093 #define  EDOM    33  /* Math argument out of domain of func */
00094 #define  ERANGE    34  /* Math result not representable */
00095 #define  EDEADLK    35  /* Resource deadlock would occur */
00096 #define  ENAMETOOLONG  36  /* File name too long */
00097 #define  ENOLCK    37  /* No record locks available */
00098 #define  ENOSYS    38  /* Function not implemented */
00099 #define  ENOTEMPTY  39  /* Directory not empty */
00100 #define  ELOOP    40  /* Too many symbolic links encountered */
00101 #define  EWOULDBLOCK  EAGAIN  /* Operation would block */
00102 #define  ENOMSG    42  /* No message of desired type */
00103 #define  EIDRM    43  /* Identifier removed */
00104 #define  ECHRNG    44  /* Channel number out of range */
00105 #define  EL2NSYNC  45  /* Level 2 not synchronized */
00106 #define  EL3HLT    46  /* Level 3 halted */
00107 #define  EL3RST    47  /* Level 3 reset */
00108 #define  ELNRNG    48  /* Link number out of range */
00109 #define  EUNATCH    49  /* Protocol driver not attached */
00110 #define  ENOCSI    50  /* No CSI structure available */
00111 #define  EL2HLT    51  /* Level 2 halted */
00112 #define  EBADE    52  /* Invalid exchange */
00113 #define  EBADR    53  /* Invalid request descriptor */
00114 #define  EXFULL    54  /* Exchange full */
00115 #define  ENOANO    55  /* No anode */
00116 #define  EBADRQC    56  /* Invalid request code */
00117 #define  EBADSLT    57  /* Invalid slot */
00118 
00119 #define  EDEADLOCK  EDEADLK
00120 
00121 #define  EBFONT    59  /* Bad font file format */
00122 #define  ENOSTR    60  /* Device not a stream */
00123 #define  ENODATA    61  /* No data available */
00124 #define  ETIME    62  /* Timer expired */
00125 #define  ENOSR    63  /* Out of streams resources */
00126 #define  ENONET    64  /* Machine is not on the network */
00127 #define  ENOPKG    65  /* Package not installed */
00128 #define  EREMOTE    66  /* Object is remote */
00129 #define  ENOLINK    67  /* Link has been severed */
00130 #define  EADV    68  /* Advertise error */
00131 #define  ESRMNT    69  /* Srmount error */
00132 #define  ECOMM    70  /* Communication error on send */
00133 #define  EPROTO    71  /* Protocol error */
00134 #define  EMULTIHOP  72  /* Multihop attempted */
00135 #define  EDOTDOT    73  /* RFS specific error */
00136 #define  EBADMSG    74  /* Not a data message */
00137 #define  EOVERFLOW  75  /* Value too large for defined data type */
00138 #define  ENOTUNIQ  76  /* Name not unique on network */
00139 #define  EBADFD    77  /* File descriptor in bad state */
00140 #define  EREMCHG    78  /* Remote address changed */
00141 #define  ELIBACC    79  /* Can not access a needed shared library */
00142 #define  ELIBBAD    80  /* Accessing a corrupted shared library */
00143 #define  ELIBSCN    81  /* .lib section in a.out corrupted */
00144 #define  ELIBMAX    82  /* Attempting to link in too many shared libraries */
00145 #define  ELIBEXEC  83  /* Cannot exec a shared library directly */
00146 #define  EILSEQ    84  /* Illegal byte sequence */
00147 #define  ERESTART  85  /* Interrupted system call should be restarted */
00148 #define  ESTRPIPE  86  /* Streams pipe error */
00149 #define  EUSERS    87  /* Too many users */
00150 #define  ENOTSOCK  88  /* Socket operation on non-socket */
00151 #define  EDESTADDRREQ  89  /* Destination address required */
00152 #define  EMSGSIZE  90  /* Message too long */
00153 #define  EPROTOTYPE  91  /* Protocol wrong type for socket */
00154 #define  ENOPROTOOPT  92  /* Protocol not available */
00155 #define  EPROTONOSUPPORT  93  /* Protocol not supported */
00156 #define  ESOCKTNOSUPPORT  94  /* Socket type not supported */
00157 #define  EOPNOTSUPP  95  /* Operation not supported on transport endpoint */
00158 #define  EPFNOSUPPORT  96  /* Protocol family not supported */
00159 #define  EAFNOSUPPORT  97  /* Address family not supported by protocol */
00160 #define  EADDRINUSE  98  /* Address already in use */
00161 #define  EADDRNOTAVAIL  99  /* Cannot assign requested address */
00162 #define  ENETDOWN  100  /* Network is down */
00163 #define  ENETUNREACH  101  /* Network is unreachable */
00164 #define  ENETRESET  102  /* Network dropped connection because of reset */
00165 #define  ECONNABORTED  103  /* Software caused connection abort */
00166 #define  ECONNRESET  104  /* Connection reset by peer */
00167 #define  ENOBUFS    105  /* No buffer space available */
00168 #define  EISCONN    106  /* Transport endpoint is already connected */
00169 #define  ENOTCONN  107  /* Transport endpoint is not connected */
00170 #define  ESHUTDOWN  108  /* Cannot send after transport endpoint shutdown */
00171 #define  ETOOMANYREFS  109  /* Too many references: cannot splice */
00172 #define  ETIMEDOUT  110  /* Connection timed out */
00173 #define  ECONNREFUSED  111  /* Connection refused */
00174 #define  EHOSTDOWN  112  /* Host is down */
00175 #define  EHOSTUNREACH  113  /* No route to host */
00176 #define  EALREADY  114  /* Operation already in progress */
00177 #define  EINPROGRESS  115  /* Operation now in progress */
00178 #define  ESTALE    116  /* Stale NFS file handle */
00179 #define  EUCLEAN    117  /* Structure needs cleaning */
00180 #define  ENOTNAM    118  /* Not a XENIX named type file */
00181 #define  ENAVAIL    119  /* No XENIX semaphores available */
00182 #define  EISNAM    120  /* Is a named type file */
00183 #define  EREMOTEIO  121  /* Remote I/O error */
00184 #define  EDQUOT    122  /* Quota exceeded */
00185 
00186 #define  ENOMEDIUM  123  /* No medium found */
00187 #define  EMEDIUMTYPE  124  /* Wrong medium type */
00188 
00189 
00190 #define ENSROK          0       /* DNS server returned answer with no data */
00191 #define ENSRNODATA      160     /* DNS server returned answer with no data */
00192 #define ENSRFORMERR     161     /* DNS server claims query was misformatted */
00193 #define ENSRSERVFAIL 162        /* DNS server returned general failure */
00194 #define ENSRNOTFOUND 163        /* Domain name not found */
00195 #define ENSRNOTIMP      164     /* DNS server does not implement requested operation */
00196 #define ENSRREFUSED     165     /* DNS server refused query */
00197 #define ENSRBADQUERY 166        /* Misformatted DNS query */
00198 #define ENSRBADNAME     167     /* Misformatted domain name */
00199 #define ENSRBADFAMILY 168       /* Unsupported address family */
00200 #define ENSRBADRESP     169     /* Misformatted DNS reply */
00201 #define ENSRCONNREFUSED 170     /* Could not contact DNS servers */
00202 #define ENSRTIMEOUT     171     /* Timeout while contacting DNS servers */
00203 #define ENSROF          172     /* End of file */
00204 #define ENSRFILE        173     /* Error reading file */
00205 #define ENSRNOMEM       174     /* Out of memory */
00206 #define ENSRDESTRUCTION 175     /* Application terminated lookup */
00207 #define ENSRQUERYDOMAINTOOLONG  176     /* Domain name is too long */
00208 #define ENSRCNAMELOOP   177     /* Domain name is too long */
